charges.charge_description: 21:952(a), 960(a)(1) and 960(b)(2)(A); 18 U.S.C. 3551 et seq. NARCOTICS-IMPORTATION/EXPORTATION-Defendant did knowingly and intentionally import into the U.S. from a place outside thereof heroin, a Schedule I narcotic drug. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant pleaded guilty to ct. 1. Remaining cts. dismissed on govt's motion. Defendant assessed $50.00. The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of twenty-four (24) months. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of three (3) years. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(i), 18 U.S.C. 3551 et seq. NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-Defendant did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute heroin, a Schedule I narcotic drug. (2)
21:952(a) &; 960(a)(1); Deft did knowingly, intentionally, unlawfully import heroin into the U.S. from a place outside. [1:93-m-1998]
